description.zh: 学习使用鼠标坐标创建交互效果，理解uniform变量的传递和使用。
description.en: Learn to create interactive effects using mouse coordinates and understand the passing and usage of uniform variables.

zh: 理解如何在GLSL中接收和使用鼠标坐标 (`u_mouse`)。
学习根据鼠标位置动态改变着色器输出。
掌握uniform变量在CPU和GPU之间传递数据的方法。
en: Understand how to receive and use mouse coordinates (`u_mouse`) in GLSL.
Learn to dynamically change shader output based on mouse position.
Master the method of passing data between CPU and GPU using uniform variables.
